verbs.description: [ARG0: Sen. John McCain] [V: makes] [ARG1: known his distaste for " evil " Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump 's mishandling of him] [ARGM-LOC: in an excerpt of his new memoir , published in the Wall Street Journal on Friday] .

[ARG0: Sen. John McCain] [ARGM-LVB: makes] [V: known] [ARG1: his distaste for " evil " Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump 's mishandling of him] [ARGM-LOC: in an excerpt of his new memoir , published in the Wall Street Journal on Friday] .

Sen. John McCain makes known his distaste for " evil " Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump 's mishandling of him in an excerpt of [ARG1: his new memoir] , [V: published] [ARGM-LOC: in the Wall Street Journal] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] .
